newsitem.title: USA: Connectivity says unit IPO deferred.
newsitem.headline: Connectivity says unit IPO deferred.

text.p: Connectivity Technologies Inc said Thursday that the initial public offering of its 85 percent owned operating subsidiary, Connectivity Products Inc has been deferred due to market conditions.
The deal was scheduled to begin trading in the company's second quarter.
The company said the opportunity for an offering would be monitored and that a further announcement would be made should the offering be re-scheduled in the future.
